name: Edge of Extinction
description:
Edge of Extinction is a game made in IFA hackathon

This was a team project, 

This game concept is based on the topic "Waste  Management".  This game takes place in a future  where the there is lack of resources for survival. The player spawns at a Industrial type location. So the player has to eliminate all the robots patrolling in the area and collect a "waste material" from them. After collecting the required amount of waste the player has to deposit in the dispenser.
